caption: An uplifting gospel choir anthem with powerful harmonies, soaring lead vocals, and triumphant organ. The arrangement builds from intimate verses to a massive congregational chorus with handclaps, tambourine, and full brass section.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Through the valley of shadows I have walked
When my faith was shaken and my spirit was lost
But a light came shining through the dark
And it filled my soul and healed my heart

[Pre-Chorus]
I was blind but now I see
Grace has set my spirit free

[Chorus]
Hallelujah, I am saved
Lifted up from the grave
Hallelujah, praise His name
I will never be the same
Hallelujah, hallelujah

[Verse 2]
Every burden that I used to carry
Every tear and every worry
Laid them down at His feet
Found a peace that is so sweet

[Pre-Chorus]
I was lost but now I'm found
Solid rock is where I stand my ground

[Chorus]
Hallelujah, I am saved
Lifted up from the grave
Hallelujah, praise His name
I will never be the same
Hallelujah, hallelujah

[Bridge]
Let the whole world hear us sing
Let the bells of freedom ring
Every voice lift up as one
Praise the Father and the Son

[Final Chorus]
Hallelujah, I am saved
Hallelujah, praise His name
Hallelujah, hallelujah

[Outro]
